title: Delivery Issues/ Missing piece
subTitle: An order was not delivered or was missing pieces
action: Check Presta, Track & Trace, Dixa & Paazl/Transsmart. Check how many boxes the order should be, how many labels have been created?

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The full order is yet to be delivered, here is the other tracking link in which will complete your order- **INSERT TRACKING LINK**
Check the returns list if the order has been returned, if it has double check the delivery address and contact number in order to resend the order.

options.action: If the customer has not provided images of the boxes, label and damaged product, then request the images in order to continue the complaint process.

Check the pictures in which the customer has provided, does this match the file on the order? 
Ensure you have the image of the full order received and the labels on the boxes received. 
If the order is high value, ask in the Customer_Experience group if anyone recognises the order.

solution.title: Delivery Issues/ Missing piece
solution.action: File and finish the complaint in Presta.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description:
Create a ticket to the Traffic team, they will invesitgate the reasoning for this and offer a solution after contacting the supplier.
The ticket should be directed to Traffic_CS, using the macro Missing Pieces and all information, images and full order number to be provided.
If the order is for an urgent event or a high value order this can be directed to Traffic_CS_Urgent. If the order is on Own_Carrier then please also double check with a senior to check the suppliers account for location of more tracking links

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: I apologise that you have received an incomplete order, I have raised this issue with our supply team so they are able to investigate the reasoning for this and provide a solution. We will get back in contact as soon as possible.

solution.title: Delivery Issues/ Missing piece
solution.action: File and finish the complaint in Presta.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description:
The supplier has attached the incorrect label to the order meaning another customer has received their order. Reprint or refund the order line affected. 
If the order is high value (PP over 500) check in the Customer_Experience group if somebody recognizes the order in order to organize a swap for the orders.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
I would like to apoligise that you have recieved the incorrect order, I can resolve this for you by reprinting the order if this would of still be of use to you? Or would a refund be better suited? The product in which you have recieved can be disposed of. (ONLY STATE THIS IF THE OTHER ORDER CAN NOT BE LOCATED) 
Any order for coporate gifts & textiles a return will be required

solution.title: Delivery Issues/ Missing piece
solution.action: File and finish the complaint in Presta.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description:
Reprint or refund the % of the order in which has been affected. 
Remember if the Supplier is Own Carrier the complaint option of Carrier will not be possible.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
If the customer has not stated the solution they require: 
I have reviewed your case and I can see that damage has occurred during transport, I apologize for this inconvenience to you. I would like to offer a reprint of the affected product if this would still be of use to you? Alternatively I can offer a refund for the affected product.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description:
Carrier 
Quality Wrong: Damaged 
Own Carrier? Check Solution
